TopicTitle: Thermal Power Generator Not Tweaking right

Articles.Content: I have noticed that the Thermal Power Generator doesn't work exactly correctly.  It tweaks right initially for the weight but as soon as you attach a magnetized target fusion reactor to it the weight jumps back up to 6 tons.  If you then disconnect the reactor the weight stays the same.  If you then scale it to the normal size it started out at it weighs more then the amount it is supposed to.
